hedline.hl1: Business People; Next Up: Isaac And His Chorus Line?

abstract.p: Designer Isaac Mizrahi, who often sings during his show on Oxygen television, turns up as vocalist in his commercials for Target line (S)

block.p: Isaac Mizrahi, the fashion designer turned talk-show host, is an old hand in the cabaret world. In fact, he is appearing at Joe's Pub in Manhattan this week. And he often sings during his show on the Oxygen network, accompanied by his pianist, Ben Walzer.
So it's no surprise that Mr. Mizrahi has now turned up as a vocalist in his latest commercials for Target stores, where he sells a line of modestly priced clothes.
